Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory558.jpg'}
{3: 'The jagged mountain path is strewn with damaged stone statues. Time has not yet stripped them of the aroma of incense etched inside.'}
{3: 'When she calms her mind to listen, there are still faint sounds of bells and chanting from long ago.'}
{3: 'Trekking further in the chorus of birds and beasts, the greenery climbing up the stone statues gradually drowns the mountain path, leaving only the indistinguishable tracks left by animals.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Where is the celestial?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao pushes aside the bush in front and wipes off the sweat, looking around.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'I must calm down. I once heard that, to find the celestial, one would need "destiny" or something...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Right, "destiny will lead your way."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I'll take this way then.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao walks forward without hesitation, entrusting her mission to instinct and destiny.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory556.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Hmm... Have I been here before? It feels so familiar.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'No, I must trust my instinct. The celestial must be not far away.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory555.jpg'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Huh? I hear water.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'I know my instinct would work!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory557.jpg'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Wow, this must be the mouth of the spring. What a great place to live.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Pulao sees a lake in front. Several streams fall from above, converging into a blue mirror that melts with the sky. The lake decorates the forest like a masterpiece of the most passionate painter, whose strokes splash around to make some of the most radically perfect paintings of sky and earth.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'The beautiful scenery also makes the silk clothes hanging on a branch extremely eye-catching.'}
{3: 'When Pulao looks closer, she even sees monkey claw marks on them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'This is so mean. Who did this?', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Unable to find anyone nearby, Pulao takes the clothes down, folds them up and puts them on a large rock near the lake that can be easily spotted. She then puts a few stones on the clothes, ensuring that they will not be blown away by the wind.'}
{3: 'The moment she finishes laying the clothes, she hears water splashing. She quickly turns around and covers her eyes.'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Wow! These are my clothes... gulp.'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Haha, I know. It must be that monkey. He really wanted to become my student... gulp.'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Anyway, thanks for getting my clothes back, little girl... gulp.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'No worries, but would you have any idea where the celestial lives on this mountain?', 4: '1'}
{2: '??', 3: "I'm right here... gulp."}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'What? Really? Celestial, I...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao looks at the direction of the voice in excitement, only to see a... PANDA standing in the mist.'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Are you that sad to see me... gulp.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'No, not at all. I swear.', 4: '1'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Liar. All the passion in your eyes is gone... gulp!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial (?)', 3: 'Ahem, but as far as I know, I am the only being that can be called "celestial" on this mountain... gulp.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The panda grabs its clothes, on which a big word "Celestial" is written.'}
{3: 'It only takes it one spin to change into them. The well-fitting outfit is obviously carefully crafted to its body shape, adding to its credibility.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celestial (?)', 3: "It's okay. It is only natural for you to have this reaction... gulp.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial (?)', 3: "Everyone who came to seek the celestial had similar reactions. I don't get you humans... gulp.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial (?)', 3: 'Do I have to put a large, gold exclamation mark on top of my head, so you can differentiate me from just any ordinary panda... gulp?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Sorry to make you feel that way...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'Oops, that was probably a little too harsh. Many said that I had a poker face... gulp.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'Relax, I was just joking. Alright, what do you need me for... gulp?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'I have a very, very important favor to ask you, celestial!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'You found my clothes, and passed the test in the mountain, so no problem.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'T-thank you! My Master is...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'Alright. I got it... gulp.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Huh? But I just started!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'Oh, I saw a dark flash, then I felt like I had already learned the entire story. What\'s that word... Oh, it\'s like "fast-forward" in your human\'s words.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: "Don't worry. It doesn't matter... gulp.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'I would love to help, but unfortunately I cannot save your Master... gulp.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'Because I don\'t have the most important ingredient, "Big Fish\'s Tear"... gulp.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "What's that?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'As the name suggests, it is the tear of Mr. "Big Fish". I need it to make the elixir that can cure all the diseases.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'But I have no idea where he is now. Last time I heard, the company assigned him to the east.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Are you saying that you can make me the elixir once I find Mr. Big Fish and get some tears from him?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'Correct... gulp.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Okay. I'll go find him right now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: "It's not safe over there... gulp.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'No problem. As long as I can heal Master, nothing is a problem!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'Good! I like your spirit... gulp.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: "Take care. I'll wait for your good news... gulp.", 4: '2'}
